summary: 3 color sets for Horses to match natural and more interesting colors.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Original textures are made by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/?]Bellyache[/url][size=2], I modified and combined them to suit my taste.[/size]


[size=2]Lore-friendly retexture of horses to match natural and more interesting colors.

Choose between 3 color sets.

Please take note:

Solitude horse texture options WILL change [b][u]Frost[/u][/b]'s appearance[b].[/b]
[b]
[/b][b][u]Shadowmere[/u][/b] and Whiterun horses share the same texture, wich is and will remain [b][u]black[/u][/b].

Read the .txt file included in the download archive and follow the instructions in order to install the mod correctly.

[/size]I do not provide docked tails from Bellyache's creature pack.


[size=4][font=Verdana]> IMPORTANT <[/font]
[/size][font=Tahoma]Install the optional files AFTER the main file and OVERWRITE when asked.[/font]


[size=2]
[list]
[*]Added an optional file wich includes the Dapple Riften horse from v_2 Alternative set for v_1 Clean set for those who enjoy the dapple grey beauties. Install manually as you did before and overwrite. 
[/list][/size][size=2]

[list]
[*]Added an optional file for matching the color of Sorrel horses from Solitude. This will change Markarth horses aswell. I recommend the v_3 Natural Sorrel for the best natural effect.
[/list][/size][font=Tahoma][size=2]

[list]
[*]Added a [u]new set of colors[/u]. Fixed the white blaze for Markarth and Windhelm horse.
[/list][/size][/font]
author: Hara

files.name: Dapple Grey Riften Horse
